name: Miłosz Stolarski
story: Miłosz Stolarski comes from a small village in Poland where he lived with his elderly mother. He joined the Polish military at a young age, hoping to provide a better life for his family. He rose through the ranks quickly, but was eventually discharged for insubordination. He now serves as a radio operator for the INDEPENDENT faction, hoping to put his skills to use and make a difference in the world.
